name: Collaboration
description: Working effectively with others to achieve common goals

name: Innovation
description: Bringing new ideas and creative solutions to the table

name: Excellence
description: Consistently delivering high-quality work and exceeding expectations

name: Leadership
description: Guiding and inspiring others to achieve their best

name: Empathy
description: Understanding and sharing the feelings of others

name: Reliability
description: Being dependable and trustworthy in all situations

name: Growth
description: Continuously learning, improving, and developing skills

name: Courage
description: Taking bold actions and speaking up for what's right

name: Creativity
description: Thinking outside the box and finding unique solutions

name: Communication
description: Expressing ideas clearly and listening actively

name: Positivity
description: Bringing energy and optimism to every interaction

name: Integrity
description: Doing the right thing, even when no one is watching
